text: The Humpbacked Horse () is a 1941 Soviet fantasy movie directed by Aleksandr Rou.Пожирнее и погуще. Как в Москве будут Масленицу отмечатьКонек-Горбунок (1941) It stars Pyotr Aleynikov, Georgy Vinogradov, and Marina Kovalyova. == Actors == * Pyotr Aleynikov - Ivanushka * Georgy Vinogradov - Ivanushka (songs) * Marina Kovalyova - Zarya-Zaryanitsa * Veniamin Gut - King Afron * Georgy Millyar - Chikhir * Lev Potyomkin - Tsap-Tsarap == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1941 movies Category:1940s fantasy movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Rou Category:Soviet fantasy movies
title: The Humpbacked Horse (1941 movie)
